sentences.en: Conversant with engine manuals, technical publications and documentation control procedures.
sentences.cn: 了解发动机手册, 技术出版物和文件控制程序.

sentences.en: Excellent Presentation Skills, conversant in Microsoft applications including PowerPoint and Excel.
sentences.cn: 优秀的沟通技能, 具有良好的英语表达能力(口语、书面).

sentences.en: Fully conversant with all hotel emergency procedures.
sentences.cn: 熟悉酒店在紧急情况发生时的对应措施.

sentences.en: He is conversant in world history.
He is conversant with all the rules.
sentences.cn: 他对全部规则都很熟悉.

sentences.en: He is conversant with Greek literature.
I am thoroughly conversant with all the rules.
sentences.cn: 我对所有的规则了如指掌.

sentences.en: I'm not conversant with the theory behind this new fuel converter.
sentences.cn: 关于这个新型燃料转换器的工作原理我不太熟悉,是什么引起的转变?

sentences.en: Mr. Taylor is thoroughly conversant with modern music.
sentences.cn: 泰勒先生对现代音乐很精通.

sentences.en: Must be completely conversant with first aid & life saving techniques.
sentences.cn: 必须完全了解急救 和 救生的技术.

sentences.en: The conductor is conversant with all of the instruments of the orchestra.
sentences.cn: 这位指挥对乐队的各种乐器都很精通.

sentences.en: Those in business are not, on the whole, conversant with basic scientific principles.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，那些从商的人并不太熟悉基本的科学原理。

sentences.en: Thus, we have difficulties in becoming conversant with derived units.
sentences.cn: 因此, 我们有困难的单位越来越熟悉衍生.

sentences.en: We become the most conversant stranger in the world.
sentences.cn: 我们变成了世界上最熟悉的陌生人.

sentences.en: You need to become fully conversant with the company's procedures.
sentences.cn: 你得对公司的程序了如指掌。

trans.tran_en: having knowledge or experience of something
